input.sentences: today my best friend got married to his high school sweetheart .
the bridal party gathered on the stares for a photo op .
old and new friends alike gathered to enjoy their union .
the ceremony was a cordial affair .
i hope the happy couple has many happy years together !
output.sentences: Not long after they graduated, the high school sweet hearts decided to get married.
This photo is my favorite from the party because no one stares directly into the camera.
Many friends gathered to see the beautiful union.
The ceremony was a fabulous affair and even long-time enemies decided to be cordial to each other for the occasion.
Now that the party is over I hope the couple enjoy a long and happy life together.
